Module com.example.demo1
Package com.example.demo1.AccountModel

Class SqliteAccountDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo1.AccountModel.SqliteAccountDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAccountDAO
public class SqliteAccountDAO extends Object implements IAccountDAO
The SqliteAccountDAO class implements the IAccountDAO interface for managing user accounts stored in a SQLite database. It provides methods to add, update, delete, retrieve an account by username, and retrieve all accounts.
